title: K-Means Clustering
subject: Machine Learning
theory:
Iterative algorithm. 
1. Pick K random centroids.
2. Assign points to nearest centroid.
3. Move centroid to mean of points.
4. Repeat until convergence.

common_mistakes.correction: Use Elbow Method (Plot Inertia vs K) to find optimal K.

interview_questions.question: Is K-Means deterministic?
interview_questions.answer: No. Depends on random initialization of centroids. (Use K-Means++ to fix).

real_world_use_cases.description: Cluster human body measurements into S, M, L groups.
